entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
